item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I’m an Android Developer, I like to write code that is extensible and maintainable using Java, Kotlin or both, for that reason I use different architectural patterns as MVVM, MVP and MVC. Also I use design patterns and strive for the compliance of the SOLID principles. I have deeper understading of the Android Basic Components like Services, Activities, Fragments, Content Providers and Broadcast Receivers. Also have experience with reactive libraries like RxJava and RxAndroid.
